DELETE /accounts/{identifier}/gateway/lo.description: Delete a Zero Trust Gateway Location.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

200.description: Delete Zero Trust Gateway Location response

success.description: Whether the API call was successful
Whether the API call was successful

4XX.description: Delete Zero Trust Gateway Location response failure

GET /accounts/{identifier}/gateway/locat.description: List Zero Trust Gateway Locations for an account.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters

client_default.description: Set if the location is the default one.

doh_subdomain.description: The DNS Over HTTPS domain to send DNS requests to. (auto-generated).

ecs_support.description: Set if the location needs to resolve EDNS queries.

ip.description: IPV6 destination ip assigned to this location. DNS requests sent to this IP will counted as the request under this location. (auto-generated).

networks.description: A list of network ranges that requests from this location would originate from.

items.description: The IPv4 address or IPv4 CIDR. IPv4 CIDRs are limited to a maximum of /24.
